Package moteur

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • moteur.Observable
      • moteur.Player
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PlayerReel, PlayerVirtuel
    public abstract class Player
extends Observable
    This class is the class for a Player, in the game, a player should be able to act like a human, which is to say, choose a card to turn up or down at the begining of each turn, or choose the offer from another player, and also at the stage of calculating the points, player should accept the visitor who is the Arbitre to check the cards, so it containes the methode accept(). Together there are other methodes who ensure the fonction of the class.

    With regard to the attributs, a player has an offer, in which there are two CardsAJouer, and a Jest, in which there are also several cards.

    Because the player can play the game by using the commande line as well as the graphic user interface, we implements the concept MVC, Player is the "Modele", and the views of users are the "Views", the latter observes the former: once the statuses are changed in the modele, the views need to be refreshed. To realize this mechanism, the Player extends Observable.

    See Also:
    PlayerReel, PlayerVirtuel, Jest, Offer

      • makeOfferToOthers

        public CardsAJouer makeOfferToOthers​(int index)
        A Player can make offer to others, when other player chooses this one, this methode will be called, with the parameter index, this Player will return the card, by using the methode getOfferByIndex(index). and delete the card from local.
        Parameters:
        index - the index of the card.
        Returns:
        CardsAJouer the card given to others.

      • takeBackTheCards

        public void takeBackTheCards()
        At the end of the round, each player will have added 1 card to their Jest, and 1 card from each player’s offer will remain on the table in front of them. If there are no cards left in the draw deck, the game ends. All players must now take the 1 card remaining from their offer in the final round, add it to their Jest, and then reveal their cards.
